What, as per you, is the role of developing and emerging countries in reviving the current global economic conditions? 

As evevybody is well aware of that, whether it is developed or developing country all had hit by global melt down,most of the reputed banks, corporates hubs and some small scale industries shut their business off becuase of the recession.Everybody had faced this bad patch,but the thing is how to cope up with this and save existing business and how a developing country react to this situation.

Most of the countries had overcome with this problem predominently,take a country like india and other asian nations and they have majorly depend upon their agricultural products,because of this most of the countries survive their economic conditions,they played their important role in salvaging economic conditions.another major part of the emerging countries is small scale industries,if anybody save this industries can achieve their expected G.D.P .

Infact every country responded well to this situation,as it is a situation like survival for fittest,developing country like india played it part by reducing the fuel,gold other metals and power consumption,and government made some schemes for the formers can get subsidies for better crops,and petroleum companies get subsidies in imports,so these are like some but the government of india had responded well and working to its goal to achieve the expected G.D.P.
